name: Interesting-libraries
body:
# Node.js

## Testing

[Mocha](http://visionmedia.github.com/mocha/) - A testing framework

[Chai](http://chaijs.com/) - A BDD/TDD framework that integrates with Mocha

## Continuous Integration

[Travis CI](http://about.travis-ci.org/) Integrated into Github
tagline: A collection of interesting libraries in a variety of domains
